---
title: Stat 351. Statistical Computing II -  Data Management and Visualization
format: html
---


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
source("schedule.R") 
library(DT)
  schedule |>
  mutate(Topic = if_else(Week <= 16, sprintf("<a href='weeks/week-%02d.html'> %s </a>", Week, Topic), Topic)) |>
  group_by(Week, Topic) |>
  datatable(escape = F, selection = 'none', filter='none', options = list(paging = F, info = F, searching = F, ordering = F), rownames = F, style = "bootstrap")
```
